channel.title: DragonFuryX Updated [26/06]
channel.description:
[URL=http://www.mybannermaker.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sdu2C.png[/img][/URL]
Welcome to the dragonfuryX server devolpment.
I started this project a time ago and tooked a break due to school work etc. I wanted to make a server with working skills, all trainable and good combat, economy. I'm using a delta based server because i started with this and it's the best part i can and pi is overused in my eyes.
[size=16pt]The idea behind the server[/size] Well, i saw progressing pi really fast and saw delta falling back more and more as i'm started with delta i want to get it back popular because not everything has been done in delta that has been done in pi. As i was doing coding a couple of time i thought to start with this. I started with some skills that i know that i could make them. After that i learned more and more and advanced in delta. Now i added tutorial island and that's only 1 thing that is happend.
[b]The team:[/b] [code]Halflive9 Mursanari[/code]
I will post an update log of every thing that will be added from today till it's finished. Idea's and suggestions are welcome.
What i have done so far: [code]*added herblore *added runecrafting with al altars and almost fully working abyss *added all skillcape emote's correctly (some were already in there but needed some fixes *started on home area and donator zone[/code]
[center]update log: [code]07/01: maded devolpment topic 08/01 started on tutorial island 09/01 added Tut, like donator but then with tut, did some more work on tutorial island 10/01 Started on dialogues and finished the first tutor. 11/01 finished the second tutor 12/01 finished the thirth tutor and the fourth (we're halfway) 14/01 finshed the fifth tutor 15/01 added iron ore shattered into pieces. 16/01 added that when u cook a shrimp it will burn. (not always) finished sixt & seventh tutor only 2 left. 17/01 finished eight tutor. (pics will come soon) 19/01 finished tutorial island. (only a few issues that need to be fixed. also i'm thinking about the skills getting max. till level 10 or something. 20/01 maded lost city fully work. (maybe i will change some more things.) 22/01 got a new team member. maded lumbridge home. 02/02 last weeks i didn't do much because of school etc. I finished the first floor and almost the second floor of dragon slayer. Also i added clue scrolls ;) 17/04 Started back devolping. I've removed the runes for teleporting. Finished the second floor of melzar's maze. 18/04 Finished the third floor of melzar's maze. Finished Melzar's maze. (will post pictures soon.) Finished all 3 map parts for dragon slayer.(obtaining) Started on road to crandor.(boat in port sarim) 23/04 Finished klarense in port sarim. 24/04 finished ned at draynor and started on duke horacio for anti-dragon shield. 25/04 Nothing today, got whole day soccer. 26/04 Did al doors in lumbridge castle. Maded the stairs working. Not much more because of homework :( 27/04 Started on shops 28/04 Got match today so don't know if any updates will come. 15/06 finished dragon slayer. (still needs testing) 25/06 Got a new team member. [/code][/center]
pics & vids. vid of melzar's maze and getting the map piece. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KvQaVEMFqlU

item.title: DragonFuryX Updated [26/06]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“g s e, post:44, topic:377228”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=473132.msg3468254#msg3468254 date=1295102138]

What i have done so far:

*added herblore *added runecrafting with al altars and almost fully working abyss *added all skillcape emote's correctly (some were already in there but needed some fixes *started on home area and donator zone

Good job on tut island, but have you coded herb and rc yourself? or used tuts.

thanks,
I coded the runecrafting myself and the herblore also i didn’t used tuts. But i must say that the base of the rc was in there so i just need to do some more things. I did the most. I maded full abyss work with the rift’s and almost the outside with the grass, and stuff u need to pass.

@ topic:
updated, new pics!
[/quote]

gj! repped for your work bro, kinda gravedug, but ohhwell been a while since i been on[/quote]
thx, well I have a break in coding this now but maybe i decide to develop this back.

Read full topic

item.title: DragonFuryX Updated [26/06]
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:25, topic:377228”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=473132.msg3469803#msg3469803 date=1295207814]

Client still needs work.

yes, but can u point out what i should change then? i’m not such a client coder but i can give it try.

Fix the gameframe. It looks like a mix between 508 and 484. Either add the 508 map area and logout X or add the 484 chatarea, tabarea and orbs. Fix the bottom stones, too. They appear to be down too far.

the orbs work fine. it’s just they dissapear when i take the picture so it’s something wrong with that.

The orbs are 508+ orbs. Your minimap is 484. The logout door is 484. The chatarea and tab area are 508+. I’m just saying you should use one gameframe or the other, not both mixed together. Especially since it looks cut-off where the map and chatareas meet.
[/quote]

ok i get what you mean but i can’t achieve that, maybe i will look for a client coder because i’m mostly a server coder and can do some basic client things.[/quote]

All you have to do is change some sprites…

Read full topic
